page.title: 08Lakeland Stores con't
page.content: The most popularn selling items are as follows:-groceries,sweets,crisps,bread and cigarettes. The people who use the shop are of all ages.They only use it for things they have forgotton to buy from town,or have run out of,because the prices are more expensive than in town,but children use it for sweets.It is open seven days a week. CLUBS The Scouts Rolleston scouts was formed in the 1930's and reformed in 1960 at the Robert Sherborne School.The new headquarters in Station Road was built in 1972 and fundraising is now underway to replace it.At the time the group leader was interviewed there were 40 Beavers,50 cubs,48 scouts 15 venture and 37 uniformed helpers.
